channel.title: +मानसतरङ्गिणीकृल्-लेखाः on संस्कारे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +मानसतरङ्गिणीकृल्-लेखाः on संस्कारे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: 11 dances of the gods.
item.description: The silapadhikAraM (6.44), the great champu written in the dramiDa language, mentions 11 dances that, as far as I know, have no mention in the literature in deva-bhAShA. We do not know if these were once prevalent over jambu-dvIpa and later became extinct. While many of the themes are clear it is hard to understand all the details from the archaic dramiDa. Dixitar’s translation clarifies most of them pretty well.
